title: Amazon’s latest Fire tablets will ship with Android 11, the first upgrade since Android 9
content:
Amazon has one of the most popular “forks” of the Android operating system with its Fire OS for tablets, and finally, the company is upgrading to Android 11.

more…

The post Amazon’s latest Fire tablets will ship with Android 11, the first upgrade since Android 9 appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: After sticking with Android 9 for far too long, Amazon is finally upgrading to Android 11 for its latest Fire tablets.
